Verification of the source: The expert examined the claims made by Twitter user Aqib Mir and the parody account of Arnab Goswami to determine their credibility and authenticity. They analyzed the background and reliability of these sources to assess the veracity of the claim.
Cross: referencing with other sources: The expert conducted a reverse-image search and found multiple links to a case report on filicide-suicide, which provided crucial evidence supporting the claim. They also referred to media outlets such as Dainik Jagran, Aaj Tak, and Patrika, which had reported on the incident, further corroborating the authenticity of the claim.
Analysis of forensic evidence: The expert examined the case report authored by a team from the Department of Forensic Medicine and Toxicology at AIIMS. They analyzed the findings related to the cause of death, presence of a poisonous substance, absence of struggle, and forensic indications of suicide. This analysis helped verify the details of the claim.
Investigation of the incident location a: The expert verified that the incident occurred in Jodhpur's Bhakri village in August 2017, as reported by one of the co-authors of the case report. They examined the timeline and location details provided by various sources to ensure consistency and accuracy in verifying the claim.
